string.text: {=sta_vil_am}The village of {VILLAGE} is under attack by {ATTACKER.PARTY} of the {ATTACKER.FACTION}!
{=sta_cas_am}The castle of {CASTLE} is under attack by {ATTACKER.PARTY} of the {ATTACKER.FACTION}!
{=sta_tow_am}The town of {TOWN} is under attack by {ATTACKER.PARTY} of the {ATTACKER.FACTION}!
{=sta_war_m}{LEADER} of the {FACTION1} has signed a declaration of war against the {FACTION2}.
{=sta_pea_m}{LEADER} of the {FACTION1} has signed a declaration of peace with the {FACTION2}.
